__e: I tell you, the way you're talking I don't understand nothing no more.
Because once it's done, never again will you have to listen to her talk like this?
Uh, well, I've been up there the last couple days listening to you talking about pizza, and I thought that you might've been hungry.
Her yes men couldn't contain her there.
And if it's okay with you... I was wondering if you'd like her to play one of her songs.
I had the pleasure of hearing you sing this afternoon.
